name: Maranatha Harvest Mission Orphanage
briefDescription: The government had given me licenses to run the orphanage the licenses no – F 26066 perhaps the government had also given me land to build a house for orphanage, therefore I request you to help me to build me the orphanage and please co-operate my Service.n my child hood days I studied up to 5th Std only. I suffered lot for Food and education. So I start MHM orphanage and growing downtrodden children.My vision is to take 300 Orphan children & give good food, education, protection, good future.To support for more widows and elders home.To protect forsaken women’s in our society.To start education for Elders and poor peoplesI am helping to more poor children for education.
